name: Alien Tank Attack
overview:
Two players fight against each other. You try to find a tank and you need gas and some ammunition for your tank. You should also find all pots with the chars from the password. With all chars you have to decode the password and destroy the headquarter of your enemy.
You'll also find beepers to open gates, smart bombs (to kill the other player), mines and rockets. You'll also need something to eat or drink and watch out for the gas of your tank!
